instructions: Change the grey rectangle's height to 167px: `rect(0, 206 + 43, 174, 167)` or more simply `rect(0, 249, 174, 167)`. This correction automatically adjusts the height of the grey rectangle and ensures it reaches the bottom of the canvas.
No changes needed for white stripe since correcting the grey rect will fix it automatically as its height is determined by the other elements.

No change needed to x,y positions of any rectangles, just the height of the grey section was throwing the apparent vertical alignment off due to the fixed canvas height.  The prior calculations now function correctly due to the amended overall layout height.
